description: A dutiful maid of the Knights of Favonius, Noelle is a Geo claymore user who can heal, shield, and deal significant damage when built as a main DPS.

artifacts.name: Husk of Opulent Dreams (2) + Retracing Bolide (2)

info: Noelle is a versatile Geo character who can serve as a healer, shielder, or main DPS. Build her for DEF%, CRIT, and Geo DMG Bonus for best results.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Favonius Bladework - Maid
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes.
Charged Attack
Drains stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks. At the end, performs a more powerful slash.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Breastplate
skills.desc: Noelle creates a shield that scales with her DEF and heals the active character when they are hit. The healing and shield strength scale with Noelle's DEF.
skills.details_html:
Breastplate
Creates a shield that scales with DEF and heals the active character when they are hit. Healing and shield strength scale with Noelle's DEF.

skills.name: Sweeping Time
skills.desc: Noelle swings her claymore, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Her ATK is converted to scale with DEF for the duration.
skills.details_html:
Sweeping Time
Swings her claymore, dealing AoE Geo DMG. ATK is converted to scale with DEF for the duration.

passive_talents.name: Devotion
passive_talents.desc: When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, the active character's DEF is increased by 20%.

passive_talents.name: Nice and Clean
passive_talents.desc: Breastplate's healing is increased by 10% of Noelle's DEF.

passive_talents.name: Maid's Knighthood
passive_talents.desc: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.desc: Breastplate's shield also heals all characters when it expires or is destroyed.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.desc: Decreases the stamina consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20%, and increases their DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Breastplate by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.desc: When Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both active, Noelle's ATK is increased by 50% of her DEF.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Sweeping Time by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.desc: Sweeping Time's ATK conversion is increased to 50% of Noelle's DEF, and every opponent defeated during its duration adds 1s to its duration, up to 10s.
